comment: Кунрад говорит прибегающим культистам после того как оглушил игрока

languages.text: "Я обещал тебе особую судьбу, {name} — пришло время исполнить ее".

traits.locale_text: "Я обещал тебе особую судьбу, {name} — пришло время исполнить ее".

languages.text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."
languages.original_text: "Я обещал тебе особую судьбу, {name} — пришло время исполнить ее".

traits.locale_text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."
"I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."
"I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."
"I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

languages.text: “我答应过，要为您带来与众不同的命运，{name}。如今，是时候兑现诺言了。”
languages.original_text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

traits.locale_text: “我答应过，要为您带来与众不同的命运，{name}。如今，是时候兑现诺言了。”

languages.text: «Le prometí que l{mf|e|a} esperaba un destino especial, {name}. Es hora de cumplirlo».
languages.original_text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

traits.locale_text: «Le prometí que l{mf|e|a} esperaba un destino especial, {name}. Es hora de cumplirlo».

languages.text: 「お前に特別な運命をやると約束しただろう、{name}。いまこそそれを果すときだ」
languages.original_text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前に特別な運命をやると約束しただろう、{name}。
「お前に特別な運命をやると約束しただろう、{name}。いまこそそれを果すときだ」

languages.text: « Je vous ai promis un destin spécial, {name}. Il est temps pour vous de l'accomplir. »
languages.original_text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai promis un destin spécial, {name}. Il est temps pour vous de l'accomplir. »

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch ein besonderes Schicksal versprochen, {name}. Nun ist es Zeit, dieses Versprechen zu erfüllen."
languages.original_text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch ein besonderes Schicksal versprochen, {name}. Nun ist es Zeit, dieses Versprechen zu erfüllen."

languages.text: "Sana çok özel bir kader vadetmiştim {name}. Onu gerçekleştirme zamanı."
languages.original_text: "I promised you a special destiny, {name}. It is time to fulfil it."

traits.locale_text: "Sana çok özel bir kader vadetmiştim {name}. Onu gerçekleştirme zamanı."
